verbose_text: Real-time quantitative RT-PCR indicated that both LPS and B. pseudomallei induced transcription of IL-1beta, IL-8, caspase-1, and NLRP3 genes relative to medium alone (XREF_FIG); however, transcripts of these genes were significantly less abundant in PMNs from diabetic subjects upon treatment with LPS or B. pseudomallei (XREF_FIG; P < 0.05).
evidence: LPS and B. pseudomallei induced transcription
